title: `N: const usize` gives a lot of unhelpful error messages instead of suggesting `const N: usize`

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code

```Rust
fn uwu<N: const usize>() {}
```


### Current output

```Shell
Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground)
error: const bounds must start with `~`
 --> src/lib.rs:1:11
  |
1 | fn uwu<N: const usize>() {}
  |           -^^^^
  |           |
  |           help: add `~`: `~`

error: `~const` is not allowed here
 --> src/lib.rs:1:11
  |
1 | fn uwu<N: const usize>() {}
  |           ^^^^^^^^^^^
  |
note: this function is not `const`, so it cannot have `~const` trait bounds
 --> src/lib.rs:1:4
  |
1 | fn uwu<N: const usize>() {}
  |    ^^^

error[E0404]: expected trait, found builtin type `usize`
 --> src/lib.rs:1:17
  |
1 | fn uwu<N: const usize>() {}
  |                 ^^^^^ not a trait

error[E0658]: const trait impls are experimental
 --> src/lib.rs:1:11
  |
1 | fn uwu<N: const usize>() {}
  |           ^^^^^
  |
  = note: see issue #67792 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/67792> for more information
  = help: add `#![feature(const_trait_impl)]` to the crate attributes to enable

Some errors have detailed explanations: E0404, E0658.
For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0404`.
error: could not compile `playground` (lib) due to 4 previous errors
```


### Desired output

```Shell
error: const generics are written `const` before parameter name
 --> src/lib.rs:1:11
  |
1 | fn uwu<N: const usize>() {}
  |        ^^^^^^^^
  |        |
  |        help: replace with `const N:`
```
